original_title: Behind the Soundtrack: 'Uncut Gems' with Daniel Lopatin
overview: Alongside filmmaker Josh Safdie, composer Daniel Lopatin sat down with us to detail the creative discoveries behind his synth packed score for Uncut Gems. In this exclusive documentary, Lopatin highlights the soundtrack's extensive use of Moog One and how he used the instrument to craft the film's most dramatic moments.
title: Behind the Soundtrack: 'Uncut Gems' with Daniel Lopatin
